name: To The Sky (Darksylvok)
description:
This game has been made by @deathgaze13 and @darksylvok for the ludum dare 46

In To The Sky you need to keep alive our dear ballon while it flyes to the infinity, but in this travel, many difficulties will stand in your way.

Avoid the birds, the planes, and the thrown rocks to keep it alive and get the best score in the leaderboard

Controls

WASD or ARROWS

We hope you have fun with our game
